thread.title: Dining events: Sweet treats at Naperville's new Mo's Bake Shop
thread.title_full: Dining events: Sweet treats at Naperville's new Mo's Bake Shop

author: Sara Hooker
title: Dining events: Sweet treats at Naperville's new Mo's Bake Shop
text:
Mo's Bake Shop now open Mo's Bake Shop opened recently in downtown Naperville serving doughnuts, kolaches, brownies, cinnamon rolls, filled croissants, scones, cookies, as well as fresh yeast dinner rolls, holiday pies, and gooey butter pies like the pumpkin butter, raspberry white chocolate, chocolate peanut butter and cinnamon pecan, each for $16. Hours are 6:30 a.m. to 6 p.m. Tuesday through Thursday; 6:30 a.m. to 8 p.m. Friday; 7 a.m. to 8 p.m. Saturday and 7 a.m. to 6 p.m. Sunday. Mo's Bake Shop is at 28 W. Chicago Ave., Naperville. (630) 305-0555 or mosbakehouse.com .
Chandler's Monday special Head to Chandler's Chophouse for their Monday night special: chophouse meatloaf made from scratch with Applewood smoked bacon gravy and served with garlic mashed potatoes and sauteed beans for $8.99. Complement the meal with a $7 glass of house wine or a $6 cocktail. Chandler's Chophouse and Grille is at 401 N. Roselle Road, Schaumburg. (847) 885-9009 or chandlerschophouse.com .
Wheeling's Taste of Town Wheeling celebrates a happy harvest with a Taste of Town from 5 to 8 p.m. Wednesday, Oct. 28. Participating restaurants include Bob Chinn's Crab House, Tuscany, Saranello's, Superdawg, RAM, Taste on Chestnut, Ruth's Chris, Deka, Benihana, e + o food and drink and more. The evening includes food, live entertainment, a silent auction and raffles. $35 in advance or $45 at the door. Taste of Town takes place at the Westin Chicago North Shore, 601 N. Milwaukee Ave., Wheeling. (847) 541-0170 or wphchamber.com .
 Life & Entertainment Dining
